title: Norm Comparison Visualizer
description: Interactive visualization comparing L1 (Manhattan), L2 (Euclidean), and L-infinity (Maximum) norms through their unit shapes and distance measurements.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Linear Algebra
Vectors
Norms
Distance

learningObjectives: Compare and contrast L1, L2, and L-infinity norms
Understand the geometric meaning of unit shapes for each norm
Recognize how different norms measure distance differently
Apply norm concepts to machine learning contexts

controls.name: L2 (Euclidean)
controls.description: Toggles visibility of L2 norm unit circle

controls.name: L∞ (Maximum)

controls.name: Animate
